mapper.select: SELECT l.log_id, t.task_id, t.task_name, t.task_type, l.data_date, date_format( l.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS start_date, date_format( l.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS end_date, l.duration, l.remark, l.`status` FROM tb_ucpaas_task_log l, tb_ucpaas_task t WHERE l.task_id = t.task_id AND l.log_id = #{log_id}
